attributes.action: Introduce Legacy Scheme for Undocumented Migrants living in the UK for long time
attributes.background: Undocumented migrants are suffering in this pandemic with no access to NHS. This Government should introduce a legacy scheme to regularise the status of undocumented migrants living in the UK for long time as promised by the Prime Minister on numerous occasions.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on this topic:

Amnesty for undocumented migrants after 10 years and reduce 20 year ILR rule
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592878
